body.p: The following individuals were members of the technical committee during the creation of this document, and their contributions are gratefully acknowledged.

body.draft-comment: We will add the names of additional TC members who provide feedback, participate in a review, etc.
body.p: In addition, the OASIS DITA Technical Committee also would like to recognize the following people for their expertise, insights, and assistance:
